name: qa-automation-challenge-start
description: Scripts para rodar testes automatizados de API e Mobile

scripts.test:api: npm run clean:api && robot --output api/reports/output.xml --log api/reports/log.html --report api/reports/report.html --listener allure_robotframework;api/reports/api_allure api/tests
scripts.test:mobile: npm run clean:mobile && robot --output mobile/reports/output.xml --log mobile/reports/log.html --report mobile/reports/report.html --listener allure_robotframework;mobile/reports/mobile_allure mobile/tests
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:mobile
scripts.allure:all:generate: npm run allure:api:generate && npm run allure:mobile:generate
scripts.allure:all:open: npm run allure:api:open && npm run allure:mobile:open
